title: Build a GPS tracking platform website and 2 apps for trackers
desc: We are looking for a company who have built similar GPS tracking platforms to build one for us- you must have a proven track record in it and show me samples- no other samples of other websites needed. Please be specific with examplesSpecification• GPS Track a child/adult/pet• GPS Track a vehicle or luggage• Monitor vehicle speed• Monitor elderly family members - Fall & Movement detection• Live Tracking: Track the location of your tracking devices in your vehicle, people, mobile or asset in real time on our efficient interface.• History: stores full travel history and information data of each tracker for the previous rolling 90 days.• Reports: Customise and create over 15 different detailed travel, usage and telematics reports, and export document files.• Geofencing: This feature allows users to set up custom geographical zones and boundaries around specific areas on the map.• Routes: Create and save previously travelled routes and activate alerts for vehicles that enters or leaves selected routes.• Speed Alerts• Points Of Interest (POI): Markers can be used to log and highlight different addresses, shops or points on the tracking map.• Send Commands: Change settings and modes on supported trackers directly on-line using our integrated 'Command Centre'.• Alerts & Notifications: Create SMS message or email alerts for important events such as speeding, SOS, ignition, movement and much more.• User Interface: Fully customisable user interface including time zone, colour schemes, sounds and icon sizes to name a few.• Admin Management center• Agency Management center• Billing/recurring invoicing system• Android App• IOS AppSomething similar would be [url removed, login to view]

The user may enter the drawing once per day, but may aldo watch a short advertisement to be able to enter an additional time each day. There will also be advertisements on the main Enter Drawing screen which will increase ad revenue, this kncreasing thr giveaway amount to the winner. title: Solve an error on hidden camera app
desc: Here  I am listing all issues and requirements:Requirements :REMEMBER, Below 5 functionalities are done already. You just have to create 5 buttons and start each service when corresponding button clicked.We need an app with 1 screen (here functionality most important) with following functions :1) Back camera picture taking WITHOUT FLASH2) Back camera picture taking WITH FLASH3) Front camera picture taking4) Back cam video recording5) Front cam video recordingALL THESE TO BE DONE IN BACKGROUND SERVICE AND NOT ACTIVTY CODESo whenevr i click a button , the corresponding service should be started immediately and,image should be taken, and,another readymade service to be called to upload file createdand service should end when image taken and file saved.PLEASE REMEMEBER , ALL THESE ARE DONE ALREADY.YOU JUST HAVE TO MAKE 5 buttons and repair existing services forthe above 5 features.ISSUES arising:1. CamerService (one responsible for hanging device sometimes/ or not capturing image /not capturing image immediately) , needs to be fixedDevice gets frozen and stays like that until image taken. This becomes an issue when image not taken immediately and hence device stays frozen for minutes.2. BackgroundVideoRecorder (for videos) - Please chek it once, If it runs well , then good else fix.3. Front cam VIDEORECORD Not implemented yet. You please modify  Backgroundvideorecord to make it record front camera also.Or u may make a new file.I am attaching another file named ServiceCalls which tell you how this service calls are being made.Quotation not acceptable 10USD as this is MODIFICATION based only.If we like your work we may work with you in future also.

title: Free app for Genius Kids Students to communicate with parents and students
desc: Free application for Genius Kids Students to communicate with parents and studentsThe super admin can create accounts for the various franchisees with their own log in and password.Franchisees can take pictures and videos on the ipad and then link to students and send to parents with comments. When a picture is taken, the child or children in the picture is tagged and the teacher can write comments about the picture and then send.When parents receive the picture, they can post to Facebook and other social media.Each Franchisee will have its own log inThe pictures and videos wil automatically delete from the server in 30 days.The pictures and video will have the Genius Kids watermark logo.Parents can view pictures and post comments and share on their FB, twitter, and other social media.Super admin:Can create different sub accounts for the franchisees to useAdmin can delete the sub accounts when needed or deactivate the accountsFranchisees:Log into their accounts and create student profiles and teacher profiles. Accounts can be activated or deactivated.Take pictures on ipad. Then tag the respective student and teachers and send pictures. They should be able to comment or describe the picturePicture should be sent with the genius kids logo or copyright watermarkOnce a picture is sent it should go into message sent or an archived fileParents:Receive the picture via email and be able to comment and share on facebookParents can make comments back and reply back to franchisee
